hh3cDhcpRelay.name: hh3cDhcpRelay

revisions.description: The initial version of this MIB module.

hh3cDhcpRelay.contactinfo: Platform Team Hangzhou H3C Tech. Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085

hh3cDHCPRIfSelectTable.name: hh3cDHCPRIfSelectTable
hh3cDHCPRIfSelectTable.description: A table for configuring relay mode for interfaces.

hh3cDHCPRIfSelectEntry.name: hh3cDHCPRIfSelectEntry
hh3cDHCPRIfSelectEntry.description: An entry for configuring relay mode for an interface.

hh3cDHCPRIfSelectRelayMode.name: hh3cDHCPRIfSelectRelayMode
hh3cDHCPRIfSelectRelayMode.description: If the value is on, the DHCP relay function would be enabled on this interface.

hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupTable.name: hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupTable
hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupTable.description: A table for configuring ip addresses for DHCP server groups.

hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupEntry.name: hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupEntry
hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupEntry.description: An entry for configuring ip addresses for a DHCP server group.

hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupGroupId.name: hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupGroupId
hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupGroupId.description: Group identifier of DHCP server group.

hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupServerIpType.name: hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupServerIpType
hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupServerIpType.description: Ip address type of DHCP server.

hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupRowStatus.name: hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupRowStatus
hh3cDHCPRIpToGroupRowStatus.description: Operation status of this table entry. Three actions are used: active, createAndGo, destroy.

hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable.name: hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable
hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable.description: A table for configuring DHCP server groups for interfaces.

hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupEntry.name: hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupEntry
hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupEntry.description: An entry for configuring DHCP server group for an interface.

hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupGroupId.name: hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupGroupId
hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupGroupId.description: The DHCP server group for this interface.

hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupRowStatus.name: hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupRowStatus
hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupRowStatus.description: Operation status of this table entry. Three actions are used: active, createAndGo, destroy

hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckTable.name: hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckTable
hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckTable.description: A table containing the states of dhcp security address check switchs for interfaces.

hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckEntry.name: hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckEntry
hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckEntry.description: An entry containing the state of dhcp security address check switch for an interface.

hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckSwitch.name: hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckSwitch
hh3cDHCPRAddrCheckSwitch.description: The state of dhcp security address check switch for this interface. It has two defined values: enabled and disabled. If the value is enabled, the address check function would be enabled. The default value is disabled.

hh3cDHCPRSecurityTable.name: hh3cDHCPRSecurityTable
hh3cDHCPRSecurityTable.description: A table containing the information of DHCP security.

hh3cDHCPRSecurityEntry.name: hh3cDHCPRSecurityEntry
hh3cDHCPRSecurityEntry.description: An entry containing the information of DHCP security.

hh3cDHCPRSecurityClientIpAddrType.name: hh3cDHCPRSecurityClientIpAddrType
hh3cDHCPRSecurityClientIpAddrType.description: DHCP client's net ip address type

hh3cDHCPRSecurityClientRowStatus.name: hh3cDHCPRSecurityClientRowStatus
hh3cDHCPRSecurityClientRowStatus.description: Operation status of this table entry. Three actions are used: active, createAndGo, destroy

hh3cDHCPRRxClientPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRRxClientPktNum
hh3cDHCPRRxClientPktNum.description: The total number of the packets received from DHCP clients by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRTxClientPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRTxClientPktNum
hh3cDHCPRTxClientPktNum.description: The total number of the brodcast packets transmitted to DHCP clients by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRRxServerPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRRxServerPktNum
hh3cDHCPRRxServerPktNum.description: The total number of the packets received from DHCP Servers by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRTxServerPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRTxServerPktNum
hh3cDHCPRTxServerPktNum.description: The total number of the packets transmitted to DHCP Servers by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRDiscoverPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRDiscoverPktNum
hh3cDHCPRDiscoverPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Discover packets handled by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRRequestPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRRequestPktNum
hh3cDHCPRRequestPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Request packets handled by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRDeclinePktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRDeclinePktNum
hh3cDHCPRDeclinePktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Decline packets handled by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRReleasePktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRReleasePktNum
hh3cDHCPRReleasePktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Release packets handled by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRInformPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRInformPktNum
hh3cDHCPRInformPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Inform packets handled by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPROfferPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPROfferPktNum
hh3cDHCPROfferPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Offer packets handled by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRAckPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRAckPktNum
hh3cDHCPRAckPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Ack packets handled by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRNakPktNum.name: hh3cDHCPRNakPktNum
hh3cDHCPRNakPktNum.description: The total number of the DHCP Nak packets handled by DHCP relay.

hh3cDHCPRStatisticsReset.name: hh3cDHCPRStatisticsReset
hh3cDHCPRStatisticsReset.description: This node only supports set operation. If the value is true,it will clear all of the packet statistics.

hh3cDHCPRCycleStatus.name: hh3cDHCPRCycleStatus
hh3cDHCPRCycleStatus.description: If the value is on, the cycle function would be enabled.

hh3cDHCPROption82Switch.name: hh3cDHCPROption82Switch
hh3cDHCPROption82Switch.description: If the value is enabled, DHCP relay supporting option 82 function would be enabled.

hh3cDHCPROption82HandleStrategy.name: hh3cDHCPROption82HandleStrategy
hh3cDHCPROption82HandleStrategy.description: The strategies of DHCP relay handling option 82. 'drop' indicates DHCP relay discarding the request packet including option 82. 'keep' indicates DHCP relay accepting the request packet without any change of the option 82. 'replace' indicates DHCP relay accepting the request packet on condition that it generates a new option 82 to replace the original one.

hh3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfTable.name: hh3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfTable
hh3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfTable.description: A table containing the information of DHCP option 82. This table depends on hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable. An entry of this table will be created when an entry of hh3cDHCPRIfToGroupTable is created.

hh3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfEntry.name: hh3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfEntry
hh3cDHCPRConfigOption82IfEntry.description: An entry containing the information of DHCP option 82.

hh3cDHCPROption82IfSwitch.name: hh3cDHCPROption82IfSwitch
hh3cDHCPROption82IfSwitch.description: If DHCP relay supports option 82 functions, the value is 'enabled'. If DHCP relay does not support option 82 functions, the value is 'disabled'.

hh3cDHCPROption82IfStrategy.name: hh3cDHCPROption82IfStrategy
hh3cDHCPROption82IfStrategy.description: The strategies of DHCP relay handling option 82. 'drop' indicates DHCP relay discarding the request packet including option 82. 'keep' indicates DHCP relay accepting the request packet without any change of the option 82. 'replace' indicates DHCP relay accepting the request packet on condition that it generates a new option 82 to replace the original one.

hh3cDHCPROption82IfFormat.name: hh3cDHCPROption82IfFormat
hh3cDHCPROption82IfFormat.description: The format of DHCP relay option 82. 'normal' is the standard format. 'verbose' is the detailed format.

hh3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType.name: hh3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType
hh3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType.description: Property of DHCP relay option 82 verbose format. The value can be set by user only when the value of hh3cDHCPROption82IfFormat is set with 'verbose'. If the value of hh3cDHCPROption82IfFormat is 'normal', the value is automatically set with 'invalid'. the value can not be set with 'invalid' by user. 'mac' indicates the option 82 verbose format is filled in with the mac of DHCP relay input interface. If the value of hh3cDHCPROption82IfFormat is set with 'verbose', the value is automatically set with 'mac'. 'sysname' indicates the option 82 verbose format is filled in with the name of the DHCP relay. 'userdefine' indicates the option 82 verbose format is filled in with the string defined by user. If the value is set with 'userdefine', the value of hh3cDHCPROption82IfUsrDefString must be set simultaneously.

hh3cDHCPROption82IfUsrDefString.name: hh3cDHCPROption82IfUsrDefString
hh3cDHCPROption82IfUsrDefString.description: The string defined by user to fill in the option 82 verbose format. If the value of hh3cDHCPROption82IfFormat is 'normal', or the value of hh3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType is 'mac' or 'sysname', it is set with a null string automatically and can not be modified by user. It must be set with a non-zero length string when the value of hh3cDHCPROption82IfNodeType is set with 'userdefine'.
